abstract: BHP Billiton reiterated its commitment to its bid for rival Rio Tinto, as the the world’s largest mining company posted record net income Monday.
snippet: BHP Billiton reiterated its commitment to its bid for rival Rio Tinto, as the the world’s largest mining company posted record net income Monday.
lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton reiterated its commitment to its bid for rival Rio Tinto, as the the world’s largest mining company posted record net income Monday.

headline.main: Posting Record Profits, BHP Keeps Its Eye on Rio
